description: Bubonic plague cases in China and Mongolia give Russia's marmots respite from hunters.
title: Russia cracks down on marmot hunt in plague scare
title_page: Russia cracks down on marmot hunt in plague scare - BBC News
maintext: Leaflets are being distributed in remote communities and a mobile lab for rapid diagnosis has been sent to Tashanta, near the border. Most cross-border traffic - apart from food deliveries - is already banned because of the coronavirus lockdown.
